Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Provides small businesses affected by COVID-19 an additional 90 days to pay certain monthly sales and payroll taxes
Summary: Provides small businesses affected by COVID-19 an additional 90 days to pay certain monthly sales and payroll taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide small businesses affected by COVID-19 an additional 90 days to pay certain monthly sales and payroll taxes
